column1: good length ball on sixth stump, left alone by Harvey.
fuller and tighter on fourth stump, Harvey with an awkward flat-footed poke, beaten badly.
full on the legs, flicked away through backward square.

Bartlett reels in a whale! Full and swinging into the stumps, Marsh is slow getting his feet moving and getting the bat down. Pitches in line, struck in line with middle and leg just below the knee roll, was definitely going to take out leg. Big appeal upheld without much delay.
back of a length on fifth stump, left alone.
good length ball on fourth stump, prods this with soft hands into the covers to get off the mark.
overpitched on fifth stump, drives firmly but picks out extra cover.
fullish length outside off, slashes at this and slices it to deep third man.
too full and dragged wider outside off this time, takes a step forward and carves this cleanly over extra cover this time around and races to the rope.

missed runout! Full on off, prodded nervily toward mid-off and sets off for a suicide single. Bryant has a free shot from eight yards but bounces this throw just wide of the non-striker's stumps with Harper a yard short.
full on the pads, tries to whip this away but it trickles into square leg.
full and wide, slices this high over backward point, lands just short of the rope before trickling into the foam triangle.
fullish length on off stump, defended.
Harper shuffles well outside off stump and scoops this full length ball over the keeper to the rope.
bouncer over middle stump, Harper ducks under it to leave
shuffles well outside off again to try another flick over the keeper, Steketee counters by bowling this much wider outside off, almost off the pitch and Harper checks to prod it into the covers.
good length ball on the stumps, prodded into midwicket.
full on middle, prodded back down the pitch, diving stop by Steketee in front of Harvey.
good length ball on the legs, poked tentatively into midwicket.
length ball on the stumps, Harvey whips this high over backward square, just clears the man stationed on the boundary there by about five yards.

full and wider on fourth stump, tries to slam this straight down the ground, not timed well but still gets enough lumber on it to clear mid-off up in the ring before it's tracked down and relayed in for a pair.
length ball on fourth stump, Harvey tries to slap this on the up over cover and gets a thick edge over short third man before it races away downhill to the rope.
good length ball on middle and leg, defended.
length ball on fourth stump, tries to chop this through the off side and gets a bottom edge that trickles past leg stump, Harper calls Harvey through for a tight run to short fine leg.
full and wide, driven through the covers.
full on the stumps, driven down the ground to long-on.

Mujeeb who? Wicket third ball for Kuhnemann! Sharp one-handed catch by Burns leaping at backward point! Bowled on a good length but wide outside off, Harvey tries to cut this over the off side ring but doesn't get the elevation and Burns does a bunny hop sticking his right hand up high over his head and plucks this comfortably. Wasn't coming in at a very sharp pace so it was more about timing the jump than anything and Burns did that superbly.
full and slanted into the pads, big lbw shout denied. Clearly missing leg.
full and flicked through the leg side.
full and punched down the ground.
full in the channel on fifth stump, prods at this away from his body and a thick edge taken low tumbling to the keeper's right. More of a Test line than T20 but gets rewarded nonetheless.
short on the body, pulls this flat and well short of deep fine leg, fielded on a bounce.
full on middle, chipped just short of short midwicket.

short on off stump, called a no ball as the second short ball of the over. Frankly an absurd call as Finch aborts a hook shot. This one was over the shoulder but the previous delivery in the over was not.
makes use of the free hit carving a full delivery high over the ring.
good length ball flicked through the leg side.
short and wide, goes to cut but is beaten.
full on the legs, flicked to midwicket.
full on off stump, punched back to Kuhnemann.
slanted full on the pads and Finch seizes the chance to tuck this free single into the midwicket gap.
good length ball on off, defended.
back of a length on the stumps, chips this to long-on.
full on off, driven to the cover sweeper.
short and wide, taps a cut gently behind point for one.
length ball on fifth stump, Fraser-McGurk swats this flat through long-on, fielder was very very wide and has work to do to keep this to two.

classy shot! Back of a length outside off, just keeps his hands back to punch this with soft hands along the ground past backward point, places it perfectly and timed well enough to beat deep third man and the cover sweeper.
bouncer wide outside off, could've been given as an extra for the line or the height. Umpire spoiled for choice and stretches his arms.
good length ball on fourth stump, goes back to punch past Finch and chased down by short midwicket.
squares Finch up with a fullish length ball on fourth stump, goes back to defend and a thick edge flies wide of the keeper and races through third man. Excellent ball goes unrewarded.

Wildermuth gets rewarded this time though! Identical fullish length to the previous ball but this time seams in a touch instead of holding its line. Finch is defeated playing back instead of coming forward and struck low below the knee roll beaten in defense prodding down the wrong line. Hit in front of off stump. Definitely ripping out middle.
full on off, defended back to the bowler.
skips down the track and misses a punch on a delivery darted flat into the pads, big lbw shout but it was sliding down leg, caroms to short third man.
full on the pads, flicked through midwicket.
full on middle, driven to long-on.
full on middle, punched back to Kuhnemann.
full on middle again, defended back to the bowler again.
good length ball flicked off the stumps through midwicket.
full on fourth stump, punched firmly but straight to extra cover.
good length ball on fourth stump, punched into the covers.
overpitched on off, punched straight back down the pitch through mid-off, cut off at the rope.
fullish length ball on fourth stump, prodded into the covers.

back of a length tailing down leg, Webster flicks this off his hips, got it much much finer than intended, keeper dives and gets a glove to it but only manages to parry it to the fine leg rope. Umpire signals leg byes so technically not a drop. Would've been interesting to see the call had the keeper held on.
full on the stumps, drives cleanly over mid-off and gets to the rope.
full on off, pushes this into the off side.
full on off, punched high over Kuhnemann to long-off.
full on off, defended.
good length ball defended to mid-off.
full on the legs, flicked through square leg.
back of a length on fifth stump, punched to the cover sweeper.
good length ball on off, defended to mid-off.
short and wide outside off, goes to cut and beaten at 135 kph.
back of a length on middle stump, Fraser-McGurk goes back to defend and is beaten, struck on the box. He's on his knees sucking wind.
short and punched through the ring.
on the legs and flicks this through square leg.
full on the legs, flicked through midwicket.
good length on the legs, flicked to deep midwicket.
full on the legs, flicked through midwicket.

dropped at long-on by Steketee! Overpitched on off stump, lofted drive wide of long-on, Steketee was cheating 10 yards in off the rope positioned to deny two runs along the ground and it costs him here as he runs to his right and leaps up, gets one hand to this but can't clasp on.
short on the legs, flicked to deep square leg.
good length ball flicked through the ring.
full on the legs, can't flick this away.
full again, flicks this through midwicket.
full on middle, driven back down the pitch, poor effort by Denly unable to stop this and it beats long-on and long-off as well to the rope.
full on the legs, flicked along the ground to long-on.
full on the legs, driven to long-on.
full and sliding into the pads, misses a flick, lbw shout denied. Looked to be going well down leg.
full toss at thigh height on off stump, could've easily gone for six and flubs this shot just over the bowler to long-on.
pitches it this time full on the stumps, driven to long-on.
length ball slanted across fourth stump, goes to pull and beaten.
slower yorker on middle, jammed out back to Steketee.
slower bouncer on leg stump, through the shot early.
finishes the over as he started it with a thigh high full toss on off, and just as the first ball was this one is also flubbed by the batsman wide of the bowler down the ground for a limp two.

nearly a wicket! overpitched on leg stump, clears the front leg and skies this high over mid-on, Bryant charges back from the ring during the Power Surge and dives trying to claim an over the shoulder catch but it lands just about a foot out of his reach. Brilliant effort but never got a hand to it in the end and they take a pair.
good length ball on fifth stump, batsman shuffles way outside off stump to flick over the keeper.
good length ball on off, can't get this away.
attempted yorker on middle, carved to backward point.
short on the hips, pulled off the thigh to short fine leg.
good length on the legs, flicked through square leg for a pair.
in the slot on fifth stump, goes to heave over midwicket and beaten.
length ball on fourth stump, swats this flat over cow corner, just barely clears the rope. Super shot. Where was that in the Power Surge?

six and out. Full in the slot on leg stump, tries to helicopter flick this over long-on, instead skies this to the man coming in off the rope. Simple catch taken just beyond the ring. Third umpire is taking an eternity lookling at Steketee's feet on the landing before deciding that he just had enough of his foot grounded before the crease on delivery.
full on off stump, punched to extra cover.
short on off, slaps this into the ground back to the bowler.
good length ball on off, punched to extra cover.
full on fourth stump, scuffs a drive back to Morkel.

fullish length on middle stump, tries to heave this over midwicket but skies this over point. Captain Lynn is positioned under this on the ring as it swirls around. He dives forward at the last moment waiting for it to come back to earth and it nearly bursts through his fingertips but he's get very strong pinkies that keep it from making it to the turf.
wide yorker on fifth stump, beats him trying to jam this out through point.
low full toss on leg stump, charges down the pitch and punches to extra cover.
low full toss driven through the covers.
short on the stumps, pulls this high over backward square and makes it all the way to the rope.
full and wide, full and driven to the off side.
length ball on the stumps, Webster crunches this flat over wide long-on, clears the rope and thuds into the LCD ad boards.
in the slot wide outside off, Webster carves this high over extra cover and the sweeper is too square to have any chance at intercepting.
full and wide once more, this time doesn't strike it as cleanly and skies a drive over backward point, spins away for a pair.
wide yorker this time, jammed out into the covers.
wide yorker again on fifth stump, jammed out to extra cover.
fullish length ball flicked away for a tight run.
wide yorker, stabbed out to extra cover.
wide yorker, Imad shuffles way outside off intending to flick a scoop over the keeper but the length made that impossible, flicks a single through square leg instead.
knee high full toss outside off, heaves this high and deep over cow corner.
full and wide, beats Webster heaving to clear cover.

full and wide, slices a drive high over cover, Webster races back to beat the relay from the sweeper which pulls the keeper well away from the stumps despite Webster being way short and it allows him to complete an unbeaten 50 off 40 deliveries.
good length ball defended.
short on fourth stump, goes to cut but cramped for room and beaten by the extra bounce.
wider outside off, cuts this to backward point.
good length ball on middle, prodded to midwicket.
good length ball on off, goes back to flick to midwicket.
zips this in quick and flat on fourth stump, punched to cover.
good length ball on the stumps, can't flick this away and comes off the pads into the leg side.
full and into the legs, misses a flick again, caroms to backward point and Finch fires a rocket that forces Lynn to test out his hamstrings stretching to make his ground.
full again into the legs, consistent movement from Richardson continues troubling the pair as another flick to the leg side is missed off the pads.
length ball over middle stump, Lynn charges to swat over midwicket but is beaten.
short and wide, slaps this to the point sweeper in place in the Powerplay.
length ball on the stumps, pulls this flat to deep midwicket, fielded on a bounce.
good length ball on off, defended.
full and wide, reaches out wide to drive this high over mid-off, comes off more of the toe so doesn't come close to reaching the rope.
good length ball, can't get this away.
full and wide again, heaves a drive high over mid-off, one bounce over the rope.
skids in a quicker ball on fifth stump, beats the attempted cut.
flights this a touch more and wider outside off on a good length, beaten again on a cut.
short and wide, Lynn flat bats this back toward Richardson at head height and the bowler is late reaching his hand out to his right, eludes him back down the ground.
squares up Bryant with a fuller delivery on fourth stump, thick edge flies between the keeper and short third man, really more of a fly slip to the rope.

short and wide, slices this in the air again just barely beats that kind of fly slip a few yards in front of the ring and goes to the rope. Looked like it was gonna be a wicket but the fielder on the ring couldn't get any hang time on his leaping effort.
short and wide, beaten trying to cut.
short on the stumps, pulled to deep square leg.
knee high full toss on fourth stump, swats this through to deep midwicket.
Lynn continues to tease that short third man fielder. Skids this on short on fifth stump, slices a cut shot that just clears the ring and spins downhill to the rope.
fractionally short on fourth stump, Lynn punches this late and beats backward point, the sweeper also can't cut it off.
Imad tries to cramp Lynn bowling tighter on off stump, he leans back and swats this through extra cover to the rope, beating the sweeper the other way.
short on fifth stump, slaps this to the cover sweeper.
good length ball, goes back to flick into midwicket.
full on leg stump, defended back to Imad.
full on off, flicks this through square leg.
full on fifth stump, goes to drive through cover and is beaten.
zips this in flatter on fifth stump, beaten trying to slap through cover.
darts this in flatter on leg stump, misses a flick to midwicket. Pitched outside leg so a big lbw shout is in vain.
good length ball on middle, defended.
short and wide, slaps this to the point sweeper.
short on the stumps, goes to pull behind square and they come back for an easy second.
short on off, punched to the point sweeper.
short and wide, hammers a cut straight to the cover sweeper.
zips this in flat and quick on fifth stump on a good length, slaps this back to the bowler.
overpitched full on off, tries to seize on the first opportunity to drive but gets under this too much and can't clear Webster at long-on. Simple catch taken four yards in from the rope.
full on fourth stump, driven to extra cover.
darts this in flat and full on the legs, Lynn tries to sweep this and is beaten, but pitched well outside leg.
full and wide on fourth stump, slaps a drive past the non-striker to long-off.
full on fourth stump, tries to paddle flick this behind square but is beaten and the ball comes off the shoulder over Finch at slip.
good length ball on fourth stump, late cuts this past Finch at slip and races to the third man rope, elegant shot.
full on fourth stump, tries to paddle sweep again and misses off the pads, comes off and trickles past slip.
full on middle, driven into the pitch and skips over Noor to long-on.
good length ball on fifth stump, goes to cut and beaten.
short and wide, cuts this late to deep third man.
short and wide, left alone, too wide and signaled a bonus run.

dropped! The Afghan teenager spills a skier at deep square leg. Length ball on middle, skies a pull toward the boundary, Noor gets into position early as the ball swirls around but gets onto his knees to try to balance himself and as a result he's not in line with the ball as it sways outside his body frame at the last moment, has to lunge left well away from his body center and it bursts through his hands. Technique was poor in the final sequence and it costs him.
good length ball flicked to the leg side.
short and wide, slapped behind point.
full on the legs, sweeps this fine behind square.
full on off stump, reaches out to slog sweep this high and deep over cow corner. Lovely shot.
full on the pads, goes to sweep this and is beaten, big lbw shout denied. Gonna rip out middle stump but pitches outside leg.

full on off stump, slog sweeps this flat toward deep midwicket. Really should have been a chance but the fielder opts for the conservative option of letting it bounce in front. A more aggressive fielder would have at least put in a dive. It was in the air for quite some time.
good length ball swatted through cover.
short and wide, slaps this through the ring.
shot of the match! Short and wide, Lynn carves this flat behind point, times it superbly to have it carry all the way to the rope.
slower bouncer over middle, beaten trying to play a paddle pull.
full and wide, misses a drive aiming to go flat down the ground.

full in the slot on off stump, this time he doesn't get away with the skier heaving for cow corner. Marsh is on the ring at mid-off and shuffles behind the bowler to get underneath it, makes it look far simpler than Noor's troubles earlier on the rope. Third umpire is checking for the back foot no ball cutting the side crease and he has stepped on the side crease with the back foot. Prestwidge can't believe this. No ball called and Lynn walks back to the middle with a free hit to come.
head height no ball full toss bowled on sixth stump line, Denly not in danger of getting plunked in the head so just uppercuts this high over short third man.
short and wide, slaps this high over cover and cut off at the rope for one.
width outside off, punched wide of the cover sweeper for a pair.
full and wide, driven to the cover sweeper.
good length ball skids on from fourth stump, flicks an inside edge through square leg.
full on the legs, flicks this to short fine leg.
short and skids down leg, misses out on a pull but Hatzoglou will have to rebowl it.
good length ball flicked behind square.
flighted full and wide, mistimes a drive behind square for one.
good length ball on fourth stump, goes back and across to flick through square leg.
zips this flat on fourth stump, Denly sweeps behind square.

another dropped chance! This time at short third man. It's been a high traffic area all innings. Imad hustles him with a back of a length ball and slices a cut shot, not in control and it flies toward the man on the ring, he lunges forward but it goes right through his hands and keeps going just short of the rope.
good length ball, can't get it away.
short and wide, slaps this high over cover.
good length ball flicked through the ring.
full on off, forward prod.
short on fourth stump, kicks up off the pitch into the gloves going back to defend.
short and wide, cut to the sweeper.
full on off, plays this late to deep third man.
short and wide, slapped to the sweeper. 50 up off 39 balls. No real acknowledgment of the landmark because there's no crowd in the ground to appreciate it.
full into the legs, tries to flick this away, inside edge off the pads through the ring.

Lynn's luck finally runs out. Length ball pitches on fifth stump, perhaps an offcutter as it jags back sharply and Lynn is through the shot a touch early heaving for midwicket, drags this onto the stumps.
full on off, defended to cover.
good length ball on off, punched into the covers.
full in the channel on fourth stump, goes to drive down the ground and is beaten.
short and wide, carves a cut high over backward point, deep third man is fielding quite fine and has no chance to cut this off.
full on middle, carves this in front of point.
back of a length on fifth stump, Gregory goes to pull and feathers a bottom edge through to the keeper.
good length ball pulled to deep square leg, sliding stop on the rope.
good length ball slapped to the ring fielder.
on the stumps, tries to chip this over mid-on but mistimes it and a simple catch on the ring by Richardson.
good length ball, defended.
good length ball punched to long-off.
quicker and flatter down leg. Can't afford any wides at this stage.

Bazley charges second ball and gets caught up in the moment. Didn't really need to do this and Hatzoglou defeats him by dragging it very short on middle. Bazley tries to swat this and misses, keeper collects almost at neck height it was so short before he whips off the bails.
good length ball on off, flicked behind square.
short on the stumps, pulls this to cow corner, very long two is settled for rather than taking on the relay for a third.
short and wide, carves a cut behind point and splits the gap with short third man. That area has been peppered all innings long.
short and wide, slaps this to short third man.
short on the stumps, pulls this flat through wide mid-on, deep midwicket has no chance to cut it off.
full and wide, sweeps this through the leg side.
too full on the legs, slog sweeps this flat over deep square leg, nearly picks out a lone security guard in the empty stands.
width outside off, carves this to the sweeper.
good length ball on the legs, flicked to short fine leg.
full and drags this through midwicket for a pair.
short on fourth stump, punches this through to the cover sweeper.
attempted yorker doesn't go full enough on off stump, Burns drives this back over the bowler's head, two bounces over the rope.
short on the stumps, pulled to deep midwicket.
slides this full on the legs, flicks this down the leg side, chased down by the keeper.

back of a length on fourth stump, cramped for room trying to cut and gets a thick edge that flies past the keeper, deep third man can't cut this off and that's the match. Heat win by five wickets with eight balls to spare.
